医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究探讨脂肪酸消耗与糖尿病视网膜病变之间的关系研究人员研究了膳食脂肪酸（FA）摄入量与糖尿病视网膜病变（DR）之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-examines-the-relationship- Between-conspiration-of-fatty-acids-and-diabetic-retinopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-examines-the-relationship- Between-conspiration-of-fatty-acids-and-diabetic-retinopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78f9e473-3cd7-4e4e-8d72-5696b4196941 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:56:00 -0400 Study examines the relationship between consumption of fatty acids and diabetic retinopathy
新型多表位亚单位疫苗可诱导针对 Epstein-Barr 病毒的强大免疫反应科学家们开发出一种针对淋巴结的多表位亚单位疫苗，可在小鼠体内诱导针对 EBV 的强烈体液和细胞免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Novel-multi-epitope-subunit-vaccine-induces-robust-immune-response-against-Epstein-Barr-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Novel-multi-epitope-subunit-vaccine-induces-robust-immune-response-against-Epstein-Barr-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=607aad99-22d9-41fb-8159-cfac1688efee Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:48:00 -0400 Novel multi-epitope subunit vaccine induces robust immune response against Epstein-Barr virus
颗粒物空气污染如何导致抗生素耐药性？研究人员探索了环境中颗粒物在促进抗生素耐药性遗传因素传播方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/How-does-pativity-matter-air-pollution-contribute-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/How-does-pativity-matter-air-pollution-contribute-to-antibiotic-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48ce79eb-9f91-497b-8dc9-ec527465c5ac Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:41:00 -0400 How does particulate matter air pollution contribute to antibiotic resistance?
研究考察了单模态与多模态神经影像学方法对精神病的分类科学家们分析了单模态和多模态神经影像技术在表征精神障碍方面的有用性的最新证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-examines-unimodal-vs-multimodal-neuroimaging-methods-for-classifying-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-examines-unimodal-vs-multimodal-neuroimaging-methods-for-classifying-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ab94b44-31ba-4b61-a886-d920c00a0976 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:34:00 -0400 Study examines unimodal vs multimodal neuroimaging methods for classifying psychosis
研究发现没有证据表明社交媒体平台的渗透与心理伤害之间存在联系今天 [8 月 9 日] 发布了迄今为止最大规模的科学研究，调查了 Facebook 在全球的传播情况，发现没有证据表明该社交媒体平台的全球渗透率与广泛的心理伤害有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-finds-no-evidence-linking-social-media-platforme28099s-penetration-and-psychological-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Study-finds-no-evidence-linking-social-media-platforme28099s-penetration-and-psychological-harm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7bfc8cde-7bae-4887-953b-c58a4fbebf6b Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:33:34 -0400 Study finds no evidence linking social media platform’s penetration and psychological harm
关于严重肥胖遗传学的新见解：寻求治疗的成年人的证据揭示了有趣的寡基因模式研究人员探讨了英国临床肥胖队列中罕见遗传性肥胖的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/New-insights-into-severe-obesity-genics-Evidence-from-adults-seeking-treatment-reveals-intriguing-oligogenic-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/New-insights-into-severe-obesity-genics-Evidence-from-adults-seeking-treatment-reveals-intriguing-oligogenic-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fad681c6-f355-4449-bc28-17fb63c85495 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:26:00 -0400 New insights into severe obesity genetics: Evidence from adults seeking treatment reveals intriguing oligogenic patterns

加糖碳酸饮料会增加患抑郁症的风险吗？研究人员采用纵向数据分析来调查含糖碳酸饮料的消费与抑郁症风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Do-sugar-sweetened-carbonated-beverages-increase-depression-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Do-sugar-sweetened-carbonated-beverages-increase-depression-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c489d397-deb2-4847-93b0-32c76577058d Mon, 14 Aug 2023 09:20:00 -0400 Do sugar-sweetened carbonated beverages increase depression risks?
